translation.en: What's up, people? Welcome to The Marlon Way.
translation.ja: 〝マーロンの世界〞〝マーロンの世界〞へようこそ

translation.en: I'm Marlon.
translation.ja: 俺はマーロン

translation.en: Good news! We just hit six million subscribers!
translation.ja: 登録者数が６００万人に達したぜ！

translation.en: I woke up this morning at 5:15 a.m.,
translation.ja: 今朝は５時15分に起きた

translation.en: and I thought to myself, "Why am I up so early?"
translation.ja: なぜか早く目が覚めちまった

translation.en: But more importantly, "Why am I the only one up this early?"
translation.ja: 〝起きてるのは―〞 〝俺だけかよ〞って思ったんだ

translation.en: So I decided to drive over to my ex-wife Ashley's house,
translation.ja: だから元女房の家に行って 家族を巻き込むことにした

translation.en: to invite her and the kids to join me.
translation.ja: 家族を巻き込むことにした

translation.en: Ashley! [screaming]
translation.ja: アシュリー！

translation.en: Marlon, get out!
translation.ja: 出てって

translation.en: [cow bell ringing] [Marlon] Marley!
translation.ja: マーリー！

translation.en: Why are you my dad?
translation.ja: こんなパパ　やだ！

translation.en: [Marlon] Surprise!
translation.ja: ザック！

translation.en: Marley, Zack! What the...
translation.ja: マーリー　ザック…

translation.en: [Zack] Hey, Mom. Check out the fort. Do you like it?
translation.ja: 基地を見てよ　気に入った？

translation.en: It's... it's amazing.
translation.ja: ええ すごいわ

translation.en: It was Dad's idea.
translation.ja: パパが考えた

translation.en: Pretty cool, huh?
translation.ja: クールだろ？

translation.en: It's super cool.
translation.ja: 超クールだけど

translation.en: And you used my expensive sheets.
translation.ja: 高級シーツを使ったのね

translation.en: You wanna see inside, Mom?
translation.ja: 中を見る？

translation.en: I would love to. Thank you.
translation.ja: 見たいわ

translation.en: -Hold up. -Hold up.
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: [both] What's the password?
translation.ja: 合言葉を

translation.en: [Zack] Here's the hint.
translation.ja: ヒントは―

translation.en: What do Dad and I love more than anything in the world?
translation.ja: 僕たちが世界一愛するもの

translation.en: Farts.
translation.ja: オナラ

translation.en: -Oh, she's good! -She knows us so well!
translation.ja: そうきたか

translation.en: That's a good guess, but that's not it.
translation.ja: ウケるが ハズレだ

translation.en: What's the one thing in the world that the kids and I cannot live without?
translation.ja: 俺と子供たちの生きる糧だよ

translation.en: Wait. Marley's in there?
translation.ja: マーリーも中に？

translation.en: I'm in the library. Can you please keep it down?
translation.ja: 図書室にいるの静かにして

translation.en: Come on, Ash. Guess the password.
translation.ja: 合言葉を言って

translation.en: -I don't know the password. -[Marlon] Come on. And I have to put these groceries down. [Marlon grunting]
translation.ja: 分からないわ荷物を下ろさないと

translation.en: All right. Hey. You fortify the ceiling in the rumpus room.
translation.ja: 娯楽室の天井を強化しろ

translation.en: And don't use the toilet yet, okay?
translation.ja: トイレは まだ使うな

translation.en: -[Ashley] Marlon? -[Marlon] Hey.
translation.ja: マーロン

translation.en: Why is it that the really big, disruptive projects always happen at my house?
translation.ja: 何でいつも私の家で邪魔くさい物を作るの？

translation.en: Well, for one thing, I only got one set of sheets.
translation.ja: 俺のシーツじゃ足りないし

translation.en: You don't want to use those.
translation.ja: 使いたくないだろ

translation.en: [Marlon] Here, hold this.
translation.ja: 持って

translation.en: Now, I want you to smile. Act like you like it.
translation.ja: 笑顔でね うれしそうに

translation.en: -One, two, three, say, "cheese." -Cheese!
translation.ja: うれしそうに チーズ！

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay, so...
translation.ja: よし 何の宣伝？

translation.en: What did we just sell?
translation.ja: 何の宣伝？

translation.en: We just sold Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila.
translation.ja: 〝アルコールフリーのパコズ・テキーラ〞

translation.en: -Alcohol-free booze? -Yeah.
translation.ja: お酒なのに？

translation.en: -What's the point? -Yeah, I know, right?
translation.ja: 謎ね だよな

translation.en: I like making bad decisions.
translation.ja: 愚行が好きでね

translation.en: All I know is they're paying me to heighten the awareness to the brand.
translation.ja: 商品を宣伝すると金になる

translation.en: So, are you going to stay for dinner?
translation.ja: 夕食は食べてく？

translation.en: Let me see. Stay here and have a nice home-cooked meal with you and the kids,
translation.ja: ここで家族と手料理を食べるか

translation.en: or go home and listen to Stevie tell me the scientific reasons why The Walking Dead could never happen?
translation.ja: 俺の家で同居人とゾンビについて語るか…

translation.en: Yeah, I think I'll stay here.
translation.ja: 食べてくよ

translation.en: [Ashley] All right. Did you talk to Marley about our meeting with Miss Frye?
translation.ja: マーリーと学校での面談の話をした？

translation.en: No. You said never to parent when you are not in the room.
translation.ja: いいや干渉するなって言ったろ

translation.en: -Marlon? -Huh? Where's the coffee maker?
translation.ja: コーヒーメーカーは？

translation.en: It's in the fort. We're opening a Starbucks behind the recliner.
translation.ja: 基地にあるよスタバを開店するんだ

translation.en: Hey, make your mama a non-fat mocha latte with Frappuccino!
translation.ja: ママにノンファットのモカラテを頼む

translation.en: Extra Stevia, please, and almond milk.
translation.ja: アーモンドミルクでね

translation.en: Ash, this fort is gonna be lit.
translation.ja: 最高の基地を完成させるよ

translation.en: There's gonna be a VIP section, we're gonna have a DJ,
translation.ja: ＶＩＰルームやＤＪコーナー

translation.en: we are gonna get a bouncer to keep out all the gold-digging psychos that can't get liquor.
translation.ja: 用心棒も置いてサイコ女を締め出す

translation.en: Looks like we're gonna need that bouncer a lot quicker than I thought.
translation.ja: 早速 用心棒が必要だ

translation.en: -Marlon. -Yvette.
translation.ja: マーロン イベット

translation.en: I thought you divorced him. He's here more now than when you were married.
translation.ja: 離婚する前より入り浸ってるわね

translation.en: [Marlon] Oh, this should be good. Marriage advice, from a girl whose longest relationship was All-Star weekend.
translation.ja: アイドルに熱を上げる女から結婚の助言とは ありがたい

translation.en: See. [chuckles] -That was the old Yvette. -Mm?
translation.ja: それは かつてのイベット

translation.en: I have a long-term boyfriend now, and his name is God.
translation.ja: 今は本命の彼氏がいるの名前は神(ゴッド)

translation.en: I hope he got some penicillin.
translation.ja: ペニシリンが要る

translation.en: -Um, excuse me, I'm celibate. -[Marlon] Yeah?
translation.ja: 禁欲的な生活をしてるの

translation.en: Yeah, well, you "sell-a-bit" of that to somebody else.
translation.ja: それがアピールポイントか

translation.en: [Ashley] Hey, hey, hey!
translation.ja: もうやめて

translation.en: Come on, now. Yvette, did you bring the shoes?
translation.ja: 靴は持ってきてくれた？

translation.en: -Girl, you know I brought the shoes. -[Ashley] Yes!
translation.ja: ええ もちろんよ

translation.en: Hold on. No, wait, wait. What's with the shoes?
translation.ja: 靴がどうした？

translation.en: [Yvette] Oh. Ashley's got plans tomorrow night.
translation.ja: アシュリーは明日の夜予定があるの

translation.en: Uh-uh. No. [clears throat] Ashley, I made family plans tomorrow night.
translation.ja: いいや 明日は家族で過ごすんだ

translation.en: I got me, you, and the kids tickets to see the new horror movie Slaughter Camp.
translation.ja: 「虐殺キャンプ」を映画館で見よう

translation.en: Oh, well, Marlon, I wish you would've told me sooner. I have plans tomorrow night.
translation.ja: もっと早く言ってよ先約があるの

translation.en: -Well, cancel them. -She can't cancel them.
translation.ja: 断れよ 口を挟まないで

translation.en: She's right, Marlon.
translation.ja: 以上よ

translation.en: Come on. What plans you all got? What you all gonna do?
translation.ja: 先約って何だよどこ行くんだ

translation.en: Stand outside of a club watching all the 21-year-olds get in
translation.ja: クラブの外で 若者を眺めながらホットドッグを食うとか？

translation.en: while you all sit there, ashy, eating street meat?
translation.ja: 若者を眺めながらホットドッグを食うとか？

translation.en: Is that more important than spending quality time with your family?
translation.ja: 家族より大事な用なのか

translation.en: [Zack] Dad! I used the fort toilet.
translation.ja: パパ　トイレ使ったよ

translation.en: Oh, son! Come on, that is your momma's Crock-Pot!
translation.ja: マジかよそれはママの電気鍋だぞ

translation.en: See? That proves that you need a night out.
translation.ja: ね？　気晴らしも必要でしょ

translation.en: Yeah, but he made family plans to see Slaughter Camp.
translation.ja: でも「虐殺キャンプ」を見に行こうって…

translation.en: It ain't always about Marlon.
translation.ja: マーロンに振り回されてる

translation.en: Girl, you're the one who ended this marriage. Why are you acting like you're still married?
translation.ja: 離婚を決意したのはあなたでしょ

translation.en: Well, you know, maybe if you ever get married and have children one day, you'd understand.
translation.ja: あなたも結婚して子供を持ったら分かる

translation.en: So, now, you're throwing shade?
translation.ja: 言ったわね

translation.en: God ain't ready for that just yet.
translation.ja: ゴッドは慎み深いの

translation.en: What's up, people? You know, what goes great with spaghetti?
translation.ja: パスタに合うものは何だと思う？

translation.en: Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila, and the babies love it, too.
translation.ja: 〝アルコールフリーのパコズ・テキーラ〞さ

translation.en: Ain't that right, son?
translation.ja: うまいだろ？

translation.en: Thanks for the margarita, Dad.
translation.ja: マルガリータ 最高！

translation.en: Marlon, you cannot post a video of a child drinking a margarita.
translation.ja: 子供がお酒を飲む動画はマズいわ

translation.en: You can if it's alcohol-free.
translation.ja: アルコールゼロだ

translation.en: Drink up, son. -Choke, choke, choke! -[Ashley] Okay!
translation.ja: さあ どんどん飲めもっとだ

translation.en: -Turn up! Turn up! Turn up! -Okay, stop, stop! Okay! I think it's time we put our phones away.
translation.ja: もういいわそろそろ携帯を置いて

translation.en: Marley. Daddy and I need to talk to you.
translation.ja: マーリー 話があるの

translation.en: Oh, Marley's in trouble! This is new. [chuckles]
translation.ja: マーリーに問題だって？珍しいね

translation.en: No one is in trouble, Zack. Okay?
translation.ja: 何も問題ないわ　ザック

translation.en: Marley, we sat with your counselor today.
translation.ja: カウンセラーから

translation.en: She said that you seem a bit withdrawn, and we just wanna make sure that you're okay.
translation.ja: あなたが孤立してるって聞いたけど どうしたの？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 話すわ

translation.en: There're these girls at school, Tiffany and Claire.
translation.ja: ティファニーたちにからかわれた

translation.en: They tweeted that I was a nerd just because I told Miss Perkins I had a passion for young adult literature.
translation.ja: 私がヤングアダルト小説を好きだから“オタク”と…

translation.en: That is very nerdy behavior.
translation.ja: すごくオタクっぽい

translation.en: [Marlon] Wait. Hold up. You're being bullied? But you go to an all-white private school.
translation.ja: 白人学校に行ってるのにイジメられてるのか？

translation.en: What does that mean, Marlon?
translation.ja: どういう意味？

translation.en: She's black.
translation.ja: この子は黒人だ

translation.en: If this was Charlie Brown, she's Franklin.
translation.ja: 「スヌーピー」でいうとフランクリンだ

translation.en: Black girls can't get bullied by little white girls.
translation.ja: 白人からは イジメられない

translation.en: Listen, white people are genetically predisposed
translation.ja: 白人からは イジメられない 白人は遺伝的に黒人を怖がる傾向がある

translation.en: to fear black people.
translation.ja: 白人は遺伝的に黒人を怖がる傾向がある

translation.en: -Marley... -Google it!
translation.ja: ググってみろ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: いい？

translation.en: Marley, just talk to the girls. You tell them bullying is wrong.
translation.ja: “イジメは間違ってる”って相手に言ってやりなさい

translation.en: What in The Brady Bunch are you talking about?
translation.ja: 何 きれいごとを言ってるんだ

translation.en: No, Marley. Listen to Daddy, okay?
translation.ja: ピンチの時は ゲットーの黒人らしく振る舞えばいい

translation.en: If them girls step to you, you just gotta act a little ghetto.
translation.ja: ゲットーの黒人らしく振る舞えばいい

translation.en: [Marlon] You know what I'm saying?
translation.ja: いいな？

translation.en: If they come at you, you gotta be like, "Oh, hell no! Oh, hell no!
translation.ja: 吹っかけられたら“絶対にイヤ(ヘル･ノー)”って言うんだ

translation.en: I know you ain't! I know you ain't!
translation.ja: “ふざけんな” “やる気ならかかってこいってんだ”

translation.en: This is what I wanted you to do!
translation.ja: “やる気ならかかってこいってんだ”

translation.en: This is what I wanted you to do!"
translation.ja: “望むところさ”

translation.en: Then you got to pull out your Vaseline, start putting Vaseline on your face,
translation.ja: ワセリンを顔に塗りたくって

translation.en: start braiding your hair just like you mean business.
translation.ja: マジな顔して髪を編み込む

translation.en: Then after that, I want you to go, "No, it's all peace. It's all peace. It's all good. We good."
translation.ja: “ケンカは終わり”って言いながら

translation.en: Then I just want you to walk away, and then you go,
translation.ja: その場から去ったら…

translation.en: "I lied, bitches! You're gonna get it!
translation.ja: “ウソだよ　ビッチ！”

translation.en: You don't know me! I don't know me!
translation.ja: “あんたもママも―”

translation.en: My momma doesn't know me, and I came out of her!"
translation.ja: “私のことを分かっちゃいない”

translation.en: Then I want you to get clapping on them, "No, I told you, you better leave me alone! I am not the one!"
translation.ja: 手をたたきながら“放っといて”って言うんだ

translation.en: You do that, I guarantee you they're gonna take off running, and they're never gonna mess with you again, okay?
translation.ja: これで相手は二度と からかってこない

translation.en: -Marley. -[Marley] Mm-hm? Please ignore Daddy's advice.
translation.ja: マーリーパパの助言は無視してね

translation.en: Baby girl, trust me. If you "black up," they're going to back up.
translation.ja: 信じてくれ黒人色を強めれば追い払える

translation.en: Now, let us pray.
translation.ja: お祈りしよう

translation.en: [Stevie] Marlon.
translation.ja: マーロン

translation.en: Your cable's broken.
translation.ja: テレビがイカれてる

translation.en: The only channel you're getting is the Oprah Winfrey Network.
translation.ja: オプラの番組しか映らないぞ

translation.en: If I have to watch another Tyler Perry movie,
translation.ja: タイラー･ペリーの映画は見飽きた

translation.en: I may become a racist.
translation.ja: 人種差別者になっちまう

translation.en: Stevie, you asked to crash on my couch for two weeks. Brother,
translation.ja: スティービー居候は２週間のはずだよな

translation.en: it's been two years!
translation.ja: もう２年も経ったぞ

translation.en: Oh, is that all you remember about our past?
translation.ja: 思い出は それだけ？

translation.en: -Do you not recall that it was me, Stevie, -Oh, god. who told you to post your first video to YouTube?
translation.ja: お前に動画配信を勧めたのは俺だぞ

translation.en: Okay, okay, you might've been instrumental in the launching of my career.
translation.ja: きっかけを作ったのはお前かもしれない

translation.en: "Instrumental?" "Instrumental."
translation.ja: 俺がいなきゃ何もできないくせに

translation.en: I'm the wind beneath your wings, bitch.
translation.ja: 俺がいなきゃ何もできないくせに ビッチめ

translation.en: "Bitch?"
translation.ja: ビッチ？

translation.en: I was using your misogynistic vernacular to drive home my point.
translation.ja: お前のマネして主張してみた

translation.en: Well, let me drive home my point.
translation.ja: 俺も言わせてもらうよ

translation.en: Get a job, bitch.
translation.ja: 働け ビッチ

translation.en: Marlon, if I may, you're being a bit more aggressive than usual. Is there anything you wanna share with me?
translation.ja: いつもより攻撃的だな何かあったのか？

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: For the first time ever, Ashley's bailing on family plans.
translation.ja: アシュリーが初めて家族を見捨てた

translation.en: She would've loved Slaughter Camp. I mean, the fun of watching a horror movie is watching her scream at the top of her lungs.
translation.ja: ホラー映画を見て叫ぶ彼女を見るのが楽しいのに

translation.en: "Don't go in there!" I love that!
translation.ja: “入っちゃダメ！”ってね

translation.en: That's frustrating.
translation.ja: そりゃ大変だ

translation.en: You know what might make you feel better?
translation.ja: 名案がある

translation.en: You moving your broke ass off my couch?
translation.ja: 出てってくれるの？

translation.en: No, that's not what you want. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 望んでないだろ

translation.en: You wanna take me to Slaughter Camp instead. I'll scream louder than Ashley.
translation.ja: 俺と映画を見ようアシュリーより叫ぶよ

translation.en: Okay, deal.
translation.ja: 決まりだ

translation.en: But you gotta change your shirt first.
translation.ja: でも着替えろ

translation.en: What's wrong with this shirt?
translation.ja: 何で？

translation.en: It's mine.
translation.ja: 俺のシャツだ

translation.en: I guess I have to change my underwear, too.
translation.ja: 下着も替えないと

translation.en: Marlon, this is the fifth message that I have left for you. It's almost seven o'clock.
translation.ja: マーロン ５回目の電話よ７時になっちゃう

translation.en: And I know any minute you are gonna walk in here, and you are gonna say...
translation.ja: 家に来たらこう言うでしょうね…

translation.en: I'm sorry I'm late,
translation.ja: 遅れて ごめん

translation.en: but I have a really good excuse.
translation.ja: これには訳がある

translation.en: Really? What is it?
translation.ja: どんな言い訳？

translation.en: Uh, actually, I thought you'd say, "I don't wanna hear no excuses."
translation.ja: 聞く耳を持たないかと思った

translation.en: So, I didn't come up with any.
translation.ja: だから考えてない

translation.en: That's what I thought. Okay, kids, time to go.
translation.ja: でしょうね ほら お迎えよ

translation.en: -Hi, Stevie. Bye, Stevie. -Kids! Hey! [Ashley] Have fun at Slaughter Camp!
translation.ja: 映画を楽しんできてね

translation.en: Hey, you guys ready to see Uncle Stevie scream like a girl?
translation.ja: スティービーが叫びまくるぞ

translation.en: Hey, hey. Where you going?
translation.ja: 何してる？

translation.en: So, Ashley's cool with you building forts in the middle of her house?
translation.ja: アシュリーは怒ってない？

translation.en: Dude, Ashley's cool with everything.
translation.ja: ああ ちっとも

translation.en: If she's so cool, why don't you guys get back together?
translation.ja: なぜ復縁しない？

translation.en: No, we're better off separated. Look, my life is perfect.
translation.ja: 離れてた方がいい俺の人生は完璧だ

translation.en: I get to do my things with the ladies, I get to hang with Ashley and the kids,
translation.ja: 女と遊びアシュリーや子供とも過ごす

translation.en: I get to have my cake and eat it, too. I wouldn't change a damn thing.
translation.ja: 両立できてる生活を手放したくない

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: I'm here to pick up Ashley.
translation.ja: アシュリーは？

translation.en: Oh, hell no!
translation.ja: 〝マーロンの世界〞 〝マーロンの世界〞ヘル･ノー！

translation.en: Hell no!
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: Hell no!
translation.ja: あり得ねえ

translation.en: Hell to the no!
translation.ja: 絶対にダメだ

translation.en: -Are you done? -Hell no.
translation.ja: 終わり？ ヘル･ノー

translation.en: I don't have time for this.
translation.ja: 忙しいの

translation.en: You know what? It's them shoes.
translation.ja: 今 気付いたが

translation.en: I should've known something was up when I've seen them shoes. See, those are ho shoes.
translation.ja: 商売女が履くような靴じゃねえか

translation.en: They're Yvette's.
translation.ja: イベットの

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.ja: やっぱり

translation.en: You know, I can't believe you lied to me.
translation.ja: よくも俺を だましたな

translation.en: Liar.
translation.ja: ウソつき

translation.en: You really wanna talk about lying in this relationship?
translation.ja: 人のことを言える立場？

translation.en: Oh, damn, woman. Why you got to live in the past? Move on.
translation.ja: 過去のことを引きずるなよ

translation.en: And you could've told me you were going on a date.
translation.ja: デートだと隠してたろ

translation.en: You know what? This is not easy for me, okay?
translation.ja: 私だって戸惑ってるの

translation.en: I haven't been on a date since 1998.
translation.ja: 最後にデートしたのは1998年よ

translation.en: Who the hell did you go on a date with in 1998?
translation.ja: 1998年にどの野郎とデートしたんだ？

translation.en: You, idiot!
translation.ja: あんたよ　バカね

translation.en: You're the last person I was on a date with.
translation.ja: デートは それきりよ

translation.en: Was that the Dru Hill concert without Sisqó?
translation.ja: ドゥルー･ヒルのライブ？

translation.en: Can we please be adults about this?
translation.ja: 大人になってよ

translation.en: Adult? Wait, I'm being an adult, okay?
translation.ja: 何だって？俺は立派な大人だ

translation.en: This... This is not about me. This is about our children, okay?
translation.ja: 子供に関係のあることだぞ

translation.en: This is about you wanting to go out with Sexy Simon, instead of spending quality family time with your kids.
translation.ja: 家族との貴重な時間よりホットな男を選んだのは君だ

translation.en: You know, this the type of stuff that makes 'em grow up to be strippers.
translation.ja: このままじゃ 子供たちが

translation.en: And I'm not talking about good strippers, you know, the flexible ones that know how to clap their booty.
translation.ja: みだらなストリッパーになっちまうぞ

translation.en: I'm talking about the little lazy ones that just stand by the pole, smacking their gum like,
translation.ja: だらしなくガムをかみながら

translation.en: "Hi, hi."
translation.ja: “ハ～イ”ってな

translation.en: Do you want that for our son?
translation.ja: 後悔するぞ

translation.en: Seriously, Ash, seeing their mother with another man? That could be traumatic for them.
translation.ja: 母親に男がデキたら子供のトラウマになる

translation.en: That could lead to serious depression.
translation.ja: 落ち込むはずだ

translation.en: Oh. They really wanna show me the fort.
translation.ja: 基地を見せてくれるらしい

translation.en: He doesn't even know the password.
translation.ja: 合言葉なしで？

translation.en: This is a really beautiful restaurant, Devon.
translation.ja: すてきなレストランね

translation.en: -For a beautiful woman. -Thank you.
translation.ja: 美女に合う どうも

translation.en: So your ex-husband, were you two together for a long time?
translation.ja: 別れた旦那さんとは古い付き合いなの？

translation.en: We met in college. Well, I was in college, and he was pretending to go to college to meet girls.
translation.ja: 彼が大学生のフリして構内にナンパしに来てたの

translation.en: But, you know what? I really don't want to talk about my ex.
translation.ja: マーロンのことは話したくない

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid we might have to.
translation.ja: でも話さなきゃ

translation.en: Why is that?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: Because he's here.
translation.ja: 来てる

translation.en: What the what?
translation.ja: こいつは奇遇だな

translation.en: That's crazy!
translation.ja: たまげたよ

translation.en: You know, I was out getting some frozen yogurt for the kids,
translation.ja: 子供のために買い物してたら

translation.en: and I looked in the window, I said, "Hey! That looks like Ashley and David."
translation.ja: 君とデビッドを見かけてね

translation.en: -It's Devon. -Is it?
translation.ja: デボン あっそ

translation.en: Marlon, why aren't you at the movies?
translation.ja: 映画はいいの？

translation.en: You know, I really wasn't digging Slaughter Camp. I couldn't feel sorry for those dumbass teenagers partying in the woods.
translation.ja: 森でバカ騒ぎするティーンに感情移入できなくてね

translation.en: You know, at a point, I just started rooting for the killer.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼を応援したくなった

translation.en: Well, it was nice to see you.
translation.ja: 会えて うれしかったわ

translation.en: -Okay, I'm sorry. -Yeah. -I'mma jet. -Okay. -Yes. -You guys get back to your little date.
translation.ja: 邪魔したなデートの続きを楽しんでくれ

translation.en: -Hey, good seeing you, Dennis. -Devon.
translation.ja: デニス デボン

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -I've already forgotten about him.
translation.ja: ごめん いいさ

translation.en: So Yvette tells me you're a great designer.
translation.ja: 君は名デザイナーだと…

translation.en: -I would love to hear more... -Real quick.
translation.ja: 君は名デザイナーだと… なあ

translation.en: While I'm here, I should tell you about the trash cans.
translation.ja: ゴミ出しのことだけど

translation.en: I got a letter from the city. They are gonna start picking up the trash cans on Thursdays
translation.ja: 収集日は木曜に変更になったと知らせが来た

translation.en: -instead of Tuesdays, so... -Well, you know what?
translation.ja: 収集日は木曜に変更になったと知らせが来た それは あとで話せばいいでしょ

translation.en: I'm sure that we can talk about this later.
translation.ja: それは あとで話せばいいでしょ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, and I... And I hear you, but you know, you just don't wanna leave garbage cans out.
translation.ja: ゴミを出したままにしたくないだろ

translation.en: God forbid, one of our kids get mauled by a bear!
translation.ja: それに子供が熊に襲われたら大変だ

translation.en: I saw The Revenant, and bear gonna do that to Leonardo DiCaprio, imagine what it's gonna do to our son's little black ass.
translation.ja: 「レヴェナント」のディカプリオみたいにね

translation.en: [Marlon] But, your date is more important than him, the potential death of our son.
translation.ja: 子供の命よりデートが大事ならしかたない

translation.en: -Give us a second, Jeff. -It's Devon.
translation.ja: 失礼 ジェフ デボンだ

translation.en: [Ashley] Marlon,
translation.ja: マーロン

translation.en: why are you here?
translation.ja: なぜ来たの？

translation.en: Because I did some research on the Internet, and I dug up some dirt on your boy Devon over there.
translation.ja: ネット検索したらヤツの噂(うわさ)を見つけた

translation.en: -What did you find out, Marlon? -Well, I'm glad you asked.
translation.ja: どんな？ よくぞ聞いてくれた

translation.en: In spite of his pretty face and those almond-shaped eyes,
translation.ja: きれいな目をしたイケメンだが

translation.en: his Equifax history shows a delinquent payment to the gas company in June of 2003.
translation.ja: 2003年６月にガス会社への支払いを滞納してたんだ

translation.en: [Ashley] What?
translation.ja: えっ？

translation.en: It starts with one late payment, then it's a slippery slope from there.
translation.ja: 一度 滞納するとどんどん落ちぶれてく

translation.en: Is there a problem?
translation.ja: 何か？

translation.en: No, it ain't no problem, brother.
translation.ja: 何でもないさ　ブラザー

translation.en: Unless you're the gas company, and people try to take advantage of you.
translation.ja: ガス会社の情報が虚偽じゃなければな

translation.en: Pardon me, sir, but I'm gonna have to ask you to leave.
translation.ja: お引き取りください

translation.en: You're not dining with us this evening, and you're clearly disrupting our guests.
translation.ja: 他のお客様に迷惑がかかってます

translation.en: Oh, really? Is that the reason? Or is it because I'm black?
translation.ja: それが理由か？それとも俺が黒人だから？

translation.en: [manager] No! God, no.
translation.ja: とんでもない

translation.en: He's black, and we're not asking him to leave.
translation.ja: 彼も黒人だが お客様だ

translation.en: Oh, wait! Oh, you're gonna call your boys... You're going to call your boys on me?
translation.ja: 仲間を呼んでつまみ出そうってのか？

translation.en: Oh! Ya'll going to make me act ghetto!
translation.ja: ゲットー流に振る舞うしかねえ

translation.en: This is what I wanted you to do! Oh! [camera clicks]
translation.ja: ワクワクしてきたぜ

translation.en: So you better ask yourself real fast, do you really wanna do this?
translation.ja: 自分の胸に聞いてみろ お前の乳首に聞いてやるこれが望みか？

translation.en: I'mma talk to your nipples. Do you really want to do this?
translation.ja: お前の乳首に聞いてやるこれが望みか？

translation.en: Oh, oh, god, I can't wait! See, that's why I carry my Vaseline around.
translation.ja: 待ち切れないぜワセリンの出番だな

translation.en: Oh, man, I ran out.
translation.ja: もうないや

translation.en: Hey, brother, do you mind if I use some of that? Thank you very much.
translation.ja: ブラザー　ちょっともらうよ

translation.en: That's it! Ya'll about to get it!
translation.ja: お前ら覚悟しろ

translation.en: I'mma drag my nails on the ground! I'mma to sharpen my nails on the ground!
translation.ja: こうやって地面で爪を研いでやる

translation.en: I get in that 45-degree angle, be like, [camera clicks] "Oh, how I hit him from there?" Because you can't.
translation.ja: 45度 傾いてパンチをかわすのさ

translation.en: And I'll do slip and slap, slip and slap!
translation.ja: よけて ビンタよけて ビンタ

translation.en: [Marlon] Oh, we are going to get violent? What you gonna do? What you gonna do!
translation.ja: 暴力沙汰になるぞどうするつもりだ

translation.en: Oh, that's what you gonna do. Okay, bye, guys.
translation.ja: こうなるのね　じゃあな

translation.en: Marlon?
translation.ja: マーロン？

translation.en: [Marlon] Yeah?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: Can I come in?
translation.ja: 入っていい？

translation.en: [Marlon] What's the password?
translation.ja: 合言葉を

translation.en: Can we please not do this right now?
translation.ja: そんな気分じゃない

translation.en: [Marlon] What's the one thing in the world the kids and I cannot live without?
translation.ja: 俺と子供たちの生きる糧は？

translation.en: I am not in the mood for this.
translation.ja: ふざけないで

translation.en: [Marlon] What is the one thing in this world the kids and I cannot live without?
translation.ja: 俺と子供たちが世界一必要なものは？

translation.en: Me?
translation.ja: 私？

translation.en: [Marlon] You may enter.
translation.ja: 入っていいよ

translation.en: What happened tonight, Marlon?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: Look, I don't know.
translation.ja: さあね

translation.en: I panicked, I guess.
translation.ja: パニクった

translation.en: Over one date?
translation.ja: 一度のデートで？

translation.en: You've been on hundreds of dates since we separated. You don't see me panicking.
translation.ja: あなたがデート三昧(ざんまい)でも私は平気だった

translation.en: That's cause you know, no matter how many women I date, I'm never gonna find anybody as good as you.
translation.ja: 俺にとって君が一番だって知ってるからだろ

translation.en: When I saw that dude with you and the kids...
translation.ja: ヤツに取られると思うと

translation.en: I just got scared.
translation.ja: 怖くなった

translation.en: I got scared he's gonna take my place.
translation.ja: 居場所がなくなる

translation.en: And I know this is a strange thing to say to your ex-wife...
translation.ja: 別れた妻に言うのも妙だけど…

translation.en: I'm just afraid to lose you.
translation.ja: 君を失いたくない

translation.en: You're never gonna lose me.
translation.ja: 失うわけないわ

translation.en: Hey, we're a family.
translation.ja: 私たちは家族だもの

translation.en: My babies, they have your eyes.
translation.ja: 子供たちと あなたの目はソックリよ

translation.en: Devon can't touch that.
translation.ja: デボンにはない

translation.en: I wish they had his eyes.
translation.ja: ヤツの目の方がいい

translation.en: They're magnificent.
translation.ja: イカしてる

translation.en: I heightened the awareness of the brand. [chuckling continues]
translation.ja: 商品の宣伝に役立ったようだな

translation.en: You're gonna get your boys on me?
translation.ja: やる気か？俺はターザンだ　ビッチめ やる気か？俺はターザンだ　ビッチめ 〝マーロンの世界〞

translation.en: I'm Tarzan, bitch!
translation.ja: やる気か？俺はターザンだ　ビッチめ 〝マーロンの世界〞

translation.en: You want none of this Spider-Man!
translation.ja: 〝マーロンの世界〞 〝マーロンの世界〞 余計な お世話だこれでも食らいやがれ

translation.en: Webs swinging in your face!
translation.ja: 余計な お世話だこれでも食らいやがれ

translation.en: Mind your business! I go incognito.
translation.ja: 余計な お世話だこれでも食らいやがれ 姿も消せる

translation.en: [man] If this gentleman had drunk Paco's Alcohol-Free Tequila,
translation.ja: パコズ・テキーラを飲めば― パコズ・テキーラを飲めば―〝アルコールフリーのパコズ・テキーラ〞 〝アルコールフリーのパコズ・テキーラ〞

translation.en: none of this would have happened.
translation.ja: 〝アルコールフリーのパコズ・テキーラ〞冷静でいられたでしょう

translation.en: Oh, that's what you gonna do. Okay.
translation.ja: 冷静でいられたでしょう

translation.en: What if we lied to him and said we were meeting
translation.ja: 時間が早まったとウソを…

translation.en: -a half hour earlier? -It doesn't work, trust me.
translation.ja: 時間が早まったとウソを… 意味ないわ

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
translation.ja: 遅れて ごめん

translation.en: I was gonna be here on time, but then I realized at the last minute, I'm incapable of that.
translation.ja: 時間どおりに着くはずが直前に無理だと悟った

translation.en: Hey, baby girl.
translation.ja: やあ マーリー

translation.en: [smooches] [Miss Frye] Mr. and Mrs. Wayne,
translation.ja: ウェインさん

translation.en: your daughter Marley said some things in the cafeteria this afternoon
translation.ja: 今日の午後 娘さんが食堂で

translation.en: that were racially charged and politically incorrect.
translation.ja: 人種問題が絡んだ不適切な発言を

translation.en: What did... What did she say?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: She paraded around the cafeteria clapping her hands,
translation.ja: 食堂で手をたたきながら歩き回って

translation.en: and threatening Tiffany and Claire,
translation.ja: 食堂で手をたたきながら歩き回って ティファニーとクレアにこう言って脅したそうよ

translation.en: saying, and I quote,
translation.ja: ティファニーとクレアにこう言って脅したそうよ

translation.en: "Oh, hell no!
translation.ja: 〝ヘル･ノー〞

translation.en: Ya'll gonna make me go ghetto.
translation.ja: 〝ゲットー 上等〞

translation.en: You don't know me. [Miss Frye] My momma don't know me.
translation.ja: 〝あんたもママも分かってないくせに〞

translation.en: Hell no. Hell no."
translation.ja: 〝ヘル･ノーヘル･ノー〞

translation.en: And there were a lot more "hell nos."
translation.ja: そのあともヘル･ノー連発よ
